io.soliton.protobuf

Class AbstractRpcServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.soliton.protobuf.AbstractRpcServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Server
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HttpJsonRpcServer, RpcServer

    public abstract class AbstractRpcServer
extends Object
implements Server
    Provides a default implementation of Server which binds to a TCP port.
